Pretty cool but very buggy. Only working in IE 11 for me.

Chrome 50 dev says: Connection with UiServer Websocket was lost. Reconnecting...

Console reports: "lib.geventwebsocket.handler Bad server protocol in headers"

Tried reloading play website via context menu and I get: "Forbidden Wrapper nonce error." Oddly if I refresh via F5, no such error.

When play page does load, no movies listed. Just see "Popular now Most downloaded Recently added"
